description: Creates a job to run on a device. A job can update a device's software or reboot it.

parameters.name: DeviceJobConfig
parameters.description: Configuration settings for a software update job. OTAJobConfig (dict) --- A configuration for an over-the-air (OTA) upgrade. Required for OTA jobs. AllowMajorVersionUpdate (boolean) --- Whether to apply the update if it is a major version change. The target version of the device software.

nested_params.name: OTAJobConfig
nested_params.description: A configuration for an over-the-air (OTA) upgrade. Required for OTA jobs.

nested_params.name: AllowMajorVersionUpdate
nested_params.description: Whether to apply the update if it is a major version change.

nested_params.name: ImageVersion
nested_params.description: The target version of the device software.

parameters.name: JobType
parameters.description: The type of job to run.
